mapper.select: SELECT mem_id_vc FROM msgr_member WHERE mem_id_vc = #{mem_id_vc}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO msgr_member (mem_id_vc, mem_pw_vc, mem_nick_vc) values (#{mem_id_vc}, #{mem_pw_vc}, #{mem_nick_vc})
mapper.select: SELECT room.room_name_vc, room.room_no_nu FROM MSGR_ROOM room, MSGR_ROOM_IN_LIST rlist WHERE room.room_no_nu = rlist.room_no_nu AND rlist.mem_id_vc = #{mem_id_vc} ORDER BY room.room_no_nu ASC
